title: Albuquerque (João Saldanha de)
body: In July 1672, he was appointed governor and captain general of this archipelago, taking office on October 20 of the same year. Due to accusations made against the government of the metropolis, the judge Manuel Soares Dourado came to Madeira to investigate his actions.

João Saldanha de Albuquerque: Governor and captain general of Madeira

1672: Appointment as governor and captain general
